verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come into my heart, blessed Jesus, Come into my heart, I pray; My soul is so troubled and weary, Come into my heart today.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Into my heart, into my heart, Come into my heart, Lord Jesus; Come in today, Come in to stay, Come into my heart, Lord Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Come into my heart, blessed Jesus, I need Thee thro' life's dreary way; The burden of sin is so heavy, Come into my heart to stay.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Come into my heart, blessed Jesus, And take all my guilt away; Then spotless I'll stand in Thy presence, When breaks Thine eternal day.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Come into my heart, blessed Jesus, O cleanse and illumine my soul; Fill me with Thy wonderful Spirit, Come in and take full control.
